tasks.label: Start Remote Program (pi@galactic-dev)
args: bash -c "source /etc/profile; sudo pigpiod -x 0x0FFFFFFF; cd /home/pi/hwdriver2; pkill -o dlv; nohup dlv debug /home/pi/hwdriver2/cmd/hwdriver2 --headless --listen=:2345 --api-version=2 > /dev/null 2>&1 &"; sleep 3

tasks.label: Install Go and Delve (pi@galactic-dev)
args: wget https://go.dev/dl/go1.23.2.linux-arm64.tar.gz && sudo rm -rf /usr/local/go && sudo tar -C /usr/local -xzf go1.23.2.linux-arm64.tar.gz && sudo echo "export GOPATH=\$HOME/go" | sudo tee -a /etc/profile && sudo echo "export PATH=\$PATH:/usr/local/go/bin:\$GOPATH/bin" | sudo tee -a /etc/profile && export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/go/bin && go install github.com/go-delve/delve/cmd/dlv@latest

tasks.label: Install pigpiod (pi@galactic-dev)
args: wget https://github.com/joan2937/pigpio/archive/master.zip && unzip master.zip && cd pigpio-master && make && sudo make install
